ABOUT_PAGE.ABOUT_TITLE2: The marketing game, a new advertising medium for brands
ABOUT_PAGE.ABOUT_CONTENT: The arrival of mobile and social media has largely changed the way brands address their prospects and customers. Audience is fragmented across platforms, users are drowned in advertising and brands do not have a clear vision of the ROI generated by their marketing actions. Based on this observation, Adictiz focuses on the assets of the marketing game as an advertising medium and industrializes its creation.Adictiz thus provides an effective solution for advertisers and agencies by allowing them to use the marketing game as a recurring advertising tool and to measure the results in terms of recruitment, commitment and conversion. With a performance-oriented approach, Adictiz was awarded the PMD Facebook (Preferred Marketing Developer) label in 2012.
ABOUT_PAGE.ABOUT_CONTENT2: The arrival of mobile and social media has transformed the way brands address their prospects and customers. Users are drowning in advertising and brands do not have a clear view of the ROI generated by their actions. Our solutions enable advertisers and agencies to use the marketing game as a recurring advertising tool and measure concrete results in terms of recruitment, engagement and conversion.
